mapper.select: SELECT USER_EMAIL, UNTACT_SEQ, USER_NAME, CLINIC_NAME, STATUS, UNTACT_DATE, CLINIC_INSTINUM, RESERVATION_SYMPTOM, ADVICE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, UNTACT_SEQ, USER_EMAIL, CLINIC_NAME, USER_NAME, STATUS, UNTACT_DATE, CLINIC_INSTINUM, RESERVATION_SYMPTOM, ADVICE FROM( SELECT A.UNTACT_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(C.CLINIC_NAME, '') CLINIC_NAME, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(A.STATUS, '') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UNTACT_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI'), '') UNTACT_DATE, NVL(A.CLINIC_INSTINUM, 0) CLINIC_INSTINUM, NVL(A.RESERVATION_SYMPTOM, '') RESERVATION_SYMPTOM, A.ADVICE ADVICE FROM TD_UNTACT_LOG A, TD_USER B, TD_CLINIC C WHERE A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.CLINIC_INSTINUM = C.CLINIC_INSTINUM AND A.USER_EMAIL = #{value} ORDER BY UNTACT_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM > 0 AND RNUM <= 5

SELECT A.UNTACT_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.CLINIC_DOCTOR, '') CLINIC_DOCTOR, NVL(B.CLINIC_NAME, '') CLINIC_NAME, NVL(A.STATUS, '') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UNTACT_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI'), '') UNTACT_DATE, NVL(A.CLINIC_INSTINUM, '') CLINIC_INSTINUM, NVL(A.RESERVATION_SYMPTOM, '') RESERVATION_SYMPTOM, NVL(A.ADVICE, '') ADVICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(C.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') PAY_DATE FROM TD_UNTACT_LOG A, TD_CLINIC B, TD_PAY_LOG C WHERE A.CLINIC_INSTINUM = B.CLINIC_INSTINUM AND A.UNTACT_SEQ = C.UNTACT_SEQ AND A.UNTACT_SEQ = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_SEQ) FROM TD_UNTACT_LOG A, TD_REVIEW B WHERE A.UNTACT_SEQ = B.UNTACT_SEQ AND A.UNTACT_SEQ = #{value}
